alert.note: Alert for Beadle; Brookings; Jerauld; Kingsbury; Lake; Miner; Moody; Sanborn (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued February 21 at 7:39PM MST until February 23 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM CST WEDNESDAY... ...BLIZZARD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM WEDNESDAY TO NOON CST THURSDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. For the Blizzard Warning, blizzard conditions expected. Total snow accumulations of 13 to 22 inches, with the highest totals expected along the Buffalo Ridge. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Portions of southwest Minnesota and central and east central South Dakota. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 6 AM CST Wednesday. For the Blizzard Warning, from 6 AM Wednesday to noon CST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. The cold wind chills as low as 30 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Travel should be restricted to emergencies only. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle. Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Beadle; Brookings; Jerauld; Kingsbury; Lake; Miner; Moody; Sanborn
